briefdescription.para: Indicate that the coding rate has been given by the header_decoder block.
Indicate that the crc presence has been given by the header_decoder block.
Indicate that the payload length has been given by the header_decoder block.
Number of bins in each lora Symbol.
Number of samples received per lora symbols.
Number of consecutive upchirps in preamble.
Number of integer symbol to skip after consecutive upchirps.
Number of items to consume after each iteration of the general_work function.
vector containing the preamble upchirps without any synchronization
number of upchirp symbols to use for CFO and STO frac estimation
fractional part of CFO using Berniers algo
indicate that the estimation of lambda_cfo/sto has been performed
upsampling factor used by the FIR interpolator
Estimate the value of fractional part of the CFO using RCTSL.

parameterdescription.para: The pointer to the preamble beginning.(We might want to avoid the first symbol since it might be incomplete)

briefdescription.para: (not used) Estimate the value of fractional part of the CFO using Berniers algorithm
Estimate the value of fractional part of the STO from m_consec_up.
Recover the lora symbol value using argmax of the dechirped symbol FFT.

parameterdescription.para: The pointer to the symbol beginning.
The reference chirp to use to dechirp the lora symbol.

briefdescription.para: Determine the energy of a symbol.
Handles the error message coming from the header decoding.
